programme.desc: Hosted by Jimmy Carr, each episode team captains Jon Richardson and Sean Lock join comedy guests to play Countdown with help from Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, and Rachel Riley on numbers.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A man falls to his death from a skyscraper window, and the new ME is shot and killed at the scene. The crimes are soon connected to ammunition dealers, an ATF agent, and Horatio's sons new stepfather.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.sub-title: A Good Man Goes To War
programme.desc: The Doctor needs an army. As he calls in debts from across the cosmos, his enemies use his closest friends to trap him. And River Song has something to tell the Doctor.

programme.title: Wallander
programme.desc: The death of man from a heart attack and the apparently unrelated murder of a taxicab driver leads Wallander to a conspiracy that stretches far beyond the borders of Sweden.

programme.title: Shetland
programme.desc: Jimmy realises he has no choice but to bring Duncan in for questioning. Duncan denies murdering Lizzie and Sally, but does admit to having an affair with Donna Killick.

programme.title: Law & Order: SVU
programme.desc: Writer Jimmy MacArthur gets granted an inside look at the city's SVU. When the rape case of a young woman escalates, Jimmy declares the crime a hoax.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: This program brings together couples who've interacted solely through LCD screens. They've supposedly fallen in love, but what will happen when they meet for the first time?

programme.title: Come Dine With Me Couples
programme.desc: Sharna and Silvar kickstart the week with a menu of family favourites, but sprightly couple Shannon and Max aren't impressed by the simplicity of what's plated up.

programme.title: Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc: In Clifford, Yorkshire, Vic and Paul Miller need help with their idyllic property. Vic longs for a house with more bedrooms for the kids and her parents to stay.

programme.title: Waiting: The Van Duren Story
programme.desc: In the 1970s, Van Duren was tipped to be the next Paul McCartney, but instead faded into obscurity. Years later, two Australians discover what went wrong.

programme.title: The War
programme.desc: January 1944 to June 1944: American and British troops are pinned down at Anzio for months, while at Monte Cassino, the killing goes on and on.

programme.title: The Profit
programme.desc: A mini racing car track and amusement park has run out of gas. Marcus Lemonis tries to help the owner get out of the past and teach his son to lead his employees, rather than just yelling at them.

programme.title: CI Australia: Families Of Crime
programme.desc: The torrid details of the notorious Milat family are explored in this episode. Members of the family continue to support Ivan Milat, the nation's worst serial killer.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: Rancid Rabbit wants to tear down CatDog's house to build a freeway./ CatDog go camping and hope to win some scouting awards.

programme.title: The BeatBuds: Let's Jam!
programme.desc: After spilling spicy fajitas on their map, the BeatBuds accidentally wander into a racetrack and meet Racer 1, the world's greatest race car driver. They sing the song Racer as they join the race.
